name: Assassin Stealth 3D
description:
Run from the templars, sneak your way to the hidden treasures. If you run fast they might see you from long distances. They can hear your walk when you are close by. But if you tread carefully, you use crunching, you find cover, you might just find your way.

- amazing graphics
- watch your health for added fun
- day and night scenes
- intelligent enemies
- guaranteed adrenaline rush

Time to show how you can cut through the dangerous city like a knife through butter.

What are you waiting for?
